result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Philip Edward Marry in court for Eric John Pirk. Defendant Eric John Pirk in court. Clerk. M.Burke. State in victim rights compliance. Attorney Marry states he needs additional time.
Status conference scheduled for December 14, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

NO RECORD MADE.  Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person and w/ Attorney Marry.  Clerk. M.Burke.   State in victim rights compliance. Attorney Marry states he is working through discovery and needs to talk with the state. STC set to 10/13/22 at 1:30.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

Amount: $20.00

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.

  *Not To Possess or Consume Controlled Substances w/o a Prescription.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Sara T, Daniel A, Edwin A, Happy Acres Campground 22230 45th St.  *Not to Possess or Consume Alcohol.

Called DE to advise him that a Condition was mistakenly left off of his bond.  Advised him if he could be in to Rm 204 by the end of business on 06/29/22 to sign an Amended bond.  Stated he will be here.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.

02:51 PM   Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in court in person.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  The Court finds probable cause in this case today.  Def. is referred to the Public Defender.  If not eligible, def. to retain his own counsel. Court date will not be adjourned due to def.'s failure to retain counsel.  Not Guilty Plea entered by the Court.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 01:40 pm.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 09:00 am.. $650  Cash bond posted and continued w/ same conditions (see previous bond entry). rb
